@toretokka never download this up update 

Update for Windows 7 for x64-based Systems (KB971033)

Update type: Important

This update to Windows Activation Technologies detects activation exploits and tampering to key Windows system files. These exploits try to bypass regular Windows activation and are sometimes included within counterfeit copies of Windows.

Right click the update and hide. Thx

@raj_07
It's a false positive.
WLoader has to edit the Registry and various things to activate windows, and since it edit the registry "without your knowledge" it will consider it a malware or virus.
Same goes for Keygens...

@Robot_Z
You don't have to keep downloading, you can munually update it with "Windows Updates"
This is mainly for people who don't have Windows 7 and need one with the latest updates so they don't have to download all updates, and install them themselves.
